main_definition: To impart knowledge or skill through instruction, explanation, or experience.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Given formal instruction on a subject by an educator.
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher taught the students about photosynthesis in biology class.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having been given knowledge or skills through experience, often informally.
meanings_and_examples.example: After years of playing guitar, he was taught by his friends to write songs.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To demonstrate a lesson or skill in order to teach someone.
meanings_and_examples.example: The chef showed how to cook the perfect steak before teaching us at the culinary school.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Informally passing on knowledge, often without formal instruction.
meanings_and_examples.example: My grandfather taught me how to fish in our family lake every summer.
